original_text: When I visit you, I know that Christ will bless us very much while we are together. When I visit you, I know that Christ will bless us very much while we are together. When I visit you, I know that Christ will bless us very much while we are together. When I visit you, I know that Christ will bless us very much while we are together. When I visit you, I know that Christ will bless us very much while we are together.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 나아갈 때에 그리스도의 충만한 복을 가지고 갈 줄을 아노라

sentences.original_text: I know that Christ will bless us very much
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도께서 우리를 매우 크게 축복하실 것을 압니다
